start.text_reactivated_profile: 👋 Welcome back! Your account has been reactivated.

stop_bot.text: ⏸️ Your account has been paused. Use /start to resume. Use delete account in settings if you want to delete all your data.

main.text: 🏠 Welcome to Munich Property Finder!This bot is designed to help you find the perfect flat or house for rent or purchase in Munich. It uses the ImmoScout24 API to search for properties based on your search criteria and sends you notifications when new offers match your preferences.📌 You can set up multiple finders to search for different types of properties or different areas.

my_data.text: 👤 Profile InformationYou can change your profile information here in settings.

settings_menu.text: ⚙️ SettingsHere you can set your preferences for the bot. You can set your address, distance, notifications, language, and more.

account.stopped: ⏸️ Your account has been paused. Use /start to resume. Use /delete_account to delete your account.
account.reactivated: ✨ Welcome back! Your account has been reactivated.

new_finder.new_finder_prompt: 🚗 Travel ModeChoose the type of travel you want to use:
new_finder.duration_prompt: ⏱️ How long would you like to travel to the destination? (in minutes)
new_finder.new_finder_success: ✅ New finder created successfully!You will start receiving notifications soon.
new_finder.new_finder_failure: ❌ New finder creation failed. Please try again.
new_finder.offer_type_prompt: 🎯 You chose the type of travel for your finder:

settings.language_changed: 🌍 Your language has been changed to English.
settings.address_prompt: 📍 Please enter your address in the format: 'Street, House Number, Postal Code' (Munich city only):

distance_set.title: 📏 Your search distance has been set to:
distance_set.commands: 💡 To see all available commands type /help

errors.unknown_command: ❓ Sorry, I didn't understand that command. Use /help to see available commands.
errors.invalid_distance: ⚠️ Please enter a valid distance (1-100 km).
errors.missing_parameters: ⚠️ Missing required information. Please try again.
errors.service_unavailable: 🔧 Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.not_registered: 👋 Please send /start to register and use the bot.
errors.wrong_duration: ⚠️ Please enter a valid duration (1-100 minutes).
errors.no_address_set: 📍 Please set your address in settings first.

proposals.no_matches: 🔍 No new matches found. We'll notify you when something comes up!

finder_data.end: 🗑️ Choose a finder id to delete:

info_messages.no_offers: 📭 No offers according to your search criteria found.

help_menu.text: 📚 Help Guide🏠 Main Menu • 👤 My Data - View your profile information • 🔍 My Finders - View your active search filters • 🏘️ My Offers - View matched apartment offers • ⚙️ Settings - Adjust your preferences ⚙️ Settings • 🌍 Language - Change bot language • 📍 Address - Set your preferred location • ➕ New Finder - Create apartment search filter • 🔔 Notifications - Toggle offer notifications • 🗑️ Delete Finder - Remove search filters 📱 Commands /start - Start/restart the bot /stop - Pause notifications ❓ Need more help? Contact @support

delete_account.text: ⚠️ Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.
delete_account.delete_success: 👋 Your account has been deleted. All your data has been removed.
delete_account.delete_cancel: ✅ Your account has not been deleted.
